condition.narrative: Finance Agreement: SCHEDULE 2, Section IV Description: No withdrawal shall be made for any DLR referred to in the table inParagraph A.2 of Section VI Schedule 2 of the Financing Agreement unless and until the Recipient has furnished evidencesatisfactory to the Association that said DLR has been achieved and verified in accordance with the Verification Protocol.Frequency: CONTINUOUS

Financing Agreement, SCHEDULE 2, Section I.C.3(a) The Recipient shall within 30 days after the Effective Date, update andthereafter adopt in form and substance satisfactory to IDA, the program operational manual containing detailed guidelines andprocedures for Program implementation, and thereafter carry out the Program in accordance with the operations manual as shall havebeen approved by IDA. Due Date: within 30 days after effectiveness.
Financing Agreement, SCHEDULE 2, Section I.C.4: The Recipient shall carry out the Action Plan in accordance with the schedule setout in the Action Plan. Frequency: CONTINUOUS

Financing Agreement, SCHEDULE 3, Section III.B: The Recipient shall have the Financial statements audited. Each audit shall coverone fiscal year. The audited financial statements for each such period shall be furnished to IDA no later than 12 months after theend of such period. Due date: Within 12 months of the close of the fiscal year.
